```go
type iPlayer interface {
	rollDice(numDice int) (diceValue int)
	getID() (playerId string)
	setPosition(newPosition int)
	getPosition() (currPosition int)
}
```

```go
type GameStatus uint8

const (
	GameInProgress GameStatus = iota
	GameFinished
)
```
